title: Ensnared
content:
Ensnared Ensnared creatures take 1d6Piercing damage at the start of each turn. Can't move and Attack Rolls against the creature have Advantage, while creature's Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throw have Disadvantage. The creature or an ally can use its action to tear away the vines.

Ensnared creatures take 1d6Piercing damage at the start of each turn.

Can't move and Attack Rolls against the creature have Advantage, while creature's Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throw have Disadvantage.
